name: Foreboding Field
description:
Welcome to your new farm! The soil is fertile, but the monsters are ready to attack.  You must survive 15 days and nights on the farm, growing crops, and using them to fend off monsters. This game was made for the Miz-Jam1 in around 30 hours, using the provided art assets. 

WASD/Mouse - move

Left mouse - Use weapon (food), select menu

E - open shop, plant food, harvest food, place fences, place farmland

Alt+F4 - Quit
